name: Noubar Tedjirian
title: Chief of Staff
bio: Noubar is the Chief of Staff to the CEO, focusing on cross-functional strategic initiatives, helping improve internal workflows, collaborating closely on communications, investor relations, and business opportunities
facts: Strategic architect of startup operations, specializing in untangling complex processes and scaling high-growth chaos into streamlined systems
Traveler, tech enthusiast, and multi-sport obsessive who can seamlessly pivot from European football to Canadian hockey
